extendedInfo.description: The Demon horde has been pushed from The City. Now it's up to you to keep them out for good.Features:- Unique blend of Tower/Castle Defender/Defense and Tactical Shooter- Build/Level Up and Upgrade your Tower with destructive weapons- Set Attack Vectors to take out the Demon Horde- Works on Phones and Tablets running Android 2.3 and up.- Story Mode to level 50- Infinite replay from level 50 - ??If you like NDA, buy something in the store so we can continue to update/tune. Let us know what you think and we'll do our best to respond!

reviews.title: WAY TOO BORING
reviews.comment: What can I say other than its just a terrible game. Dont waste your time cos you will be sorry you did for sure
reviews.author: Lucia Carpenter

reviews.title: Boring

reviews.title: Auto defense fail
reviews.comment: At lvl 4 does not shot down enemy projectiles
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Just an idea
reviews.comment: Hey guys love the game demons not allowed, but am a but hesitant about downloading update as one of the things i like about the game is that u have enemies coming from both direction (sets it apart from other TD games). And this is just a thought U COULD HAVE TWO CAMPAINS  (another campain fighting as demons against humans) one with a central tower and the other with a mounted tower. Just a thought. And again best TD game ive played.

reviews.title: Good game, worth playing
reviews.comment: Found this by accident and gave it a go because I like TD games. On sector 20 or so now, and I like it. Not too hard yet, but I see it coming! ;)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fun game
reviews.comment: Love it.  Will not install the update though since i prefer the demons on one side only.  Please make it a option for one or two sides.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: A nice variation on the typical tower defense
reviews.comment: I clicked the ad for this game on a whim and I\'m glad I did. It is nicely polished overall. There is a lot going on during each round and you have to be quick to select from the 3 weapons and 3 additional attacks (spells?) and then target the enemies. My only complaint is that switching from the playfield to the shop seems to take too long.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome!
reviews.comment: Really cool concept, I\'m really enjoying this game - check it out!!

reviews.title: Good game
